com.tyrlib2.graphics.particles

Class ParticleSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene.SceneObject
      • com.tyrlib2.graphics.particles.ParticleSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdateable, IRenderable

    public class ParticleSystem
extends SceneObject
implements IUpdateable, IRenderable
    Manages a system of particles. This includes particles, emitters, affectors, etc
    Author:
    Sascha
